summary:
Principal researcher/dev in radiotherapy, diagnostic imaging, machine learning/AI, and medical physics.

15+ years experience in medical imaging, signal processing, biomedical modeling, machine learning; software and hardware development. Cum laude PhD in medical physics & radiotherapy; Experience in busy clinics, academia, multidisciplinary teams, and biomedical industry.

Equipment calibration (detectors, dosimeters, and phantom irradiation), for various therapy modalities (IMRT, VMAT, brachy). EPID, gafchromic film, Matrixx, and ion chambers. 

Radiotherapy treatment planning software (Varian Eclipse, Oncentra Masterplan, Raysearch), also for small animals (SmART Plan).  

MATLAB, python, C++, CUDA, jupyter, javascript, VBscript, and development tools; git, cmake, doxygen, etc.  Preference for open source, linux or cross platform software.

Development with machine learning, tensorflow, keras, and several image processing or general packages ITK, VTK, openCV, numPy, sciPy, pandas, and on several platforms, AWS, Azure, rescale, and local condor cluster.

Physics simulation via finite element; COMSOL Multiphysics (RF module), openFOAM, and Monte Carlo; Geant4, EGSnrc, MCNP, XVMC.

profile_positions.description:
Research and development of projects in radiotherapy, medical imaging, and AI. Focused on the improvement of cancer detection, assessment, & treatment. 

Software & hardware development. Radiation device/detector prototyping, modelling, dosimetry & simulation. Data analysis, machine learning, and image processing.

Development and simulation of meta-material antenna arrays for Terahertz and RF applications.
profile_positions.title: Principal Researcher/Developer

profile_positions.description: Postdoc researcher in radiotherapy physics, DGRT, Monte Carlo simulation.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
PhD investigating the role of time in dynamic external beam radiotherapy such as VMAT, for the purposes of treatment verification, DGRT, and dose rate response.

Thesis title "Time dependent verification of dynamic external beam radiotherapy"
profile_positions.title: PhD student (cum laude)

profile_positions.description: Visiting researcher project @ LMU under prof. Katia Parodi. ESTRO mobility grant funded project to investigate EPID/portal dosimetry @ The Klinikum Großhadern.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Researcher

profile_positions.description: Autocad Design, electronic engineering, 3rd party software development, integrated wireless networking (EDGE, USDPA), lon networking, industrial monitoring solutions.
profile_positions.title: Electronics/software engineer

profile_positions.description: Project tester for Interactive learning project. Working in a team of two I was involved in many areas of making “Quizdom interactive learning devices” functional for 1st year physics students. This included writing VB programs for excel and PowerPoint so they could interact with the handheld devices, display coursework and retrieve, compile and sort data for grading and performance purposes.
profile_positions.title: Project tester

profile_positions.description: Physics consultant for Problem Based Learning Group. Working with a team of 8 multi -discipline graduates and doctors. Devised scenarios for 1st year general science students involving physics, chemistry and biology principles. Resultant material to be implemented into 1st year general science courses in late 2007.
profile_positions.title: Physics consultant

profile_positions.description:
As part of 10 month contract placement.

Yield / FA engineer – while working in the yield department, day to day responsibilities included compiling statistics on failing semiconductor wafers, identifying failure, cause of failure and implementing corrective measures to contain failure cost. Some identification required clean room experience with failure analysis team.
profile_positions.title: Yield/FA engineer
